# Data transformation

## Read Data
```{r}
#install.packages("RSocrata")
library("RSocrata") # read data using API
license = read.socrata("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/ptev-4hud.json?city='NEW YORK'&$limit=10")
license
```

```{r}
business = read.socrata("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/w7w3-xahh.json?$where=address_state='NY'&$limit=10")
business
```
